name: Suits
description:
Boys suits

With our contemporary approach to boy’s tailoring, Roco’s collection of children’s wear suits offer premium quality with a trend focus, for the most up-to-date formalwear looks.

With the largest selection of suits in the UK, you’ll be sure to find the perfect outfit for your young man. Our range includes everything from single items to update your wardrobe to five-piece combinations to craft the full formal look. Whether you’re seeking a distinguished design or dapper style, our range has been built to offer everything from low-key sleek attire to statement pieces. We know every growing gent is different and provide a choice of skinny, slim, modern and regular fit, for the perfect tailored feel. Shop with Roco for all your occasion wear clothing.

name: Communion suits
description:
Holy Communion Suits

Boys communion suits have traditionally focused on whites and ivories to represent the purity of the child. Nowadays children are more in touch with their fashionable side and darker colours such as navy and grey are beginning to show up more and more each year. Our stylish communion suits are offered in a range of colours from the traditional ivory suit such as the Lanzo to the more fashionable colours such as the navy Clarke. We also stock a variety of fits from our slim fit Philip to our wider fitting Alexandro.

Our communion suits also come complete with a complimentary communion tie featuring a chalice motif
